General.Name: Guangxi Wuzhou Communications Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangxi Wuzhou Communications Co., Ltd. operates toll roads. It is also involved logistics and real estate businesses. Guangxi Wuzhou Communications Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Nanning, China.

2.Name: Mr. Yingqiang  Huang
2.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board, Gen. Counsel & Non-Independent Director
